I am a London based graphic designer

My areas of expertise include web design, print work, illustration and multimedia. Being fluent in Adobe Creative Suite and with working knowledge of HTML and CSS coding I am able to execute and deliver creative ideas across multiple channels and platforms. I am looking for an exciting integrated designer position in a busy workplace.
